vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Θευδᾶς
(perh. contr. from Θεόδωρος, but see MM, Exp., xv), -ᾶ, ὁ
Theudas: Act.5:36.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.5.36
§ Theudas, "gift of God"
Theudas, (Proper name), Acts 5:36*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
丟大 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "神賜的"
迦瑪列演說中提到的一名起義的人 (徒5:36)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
丢大 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "神赐的"
迦玛列演说中提到的一名起义的人 (徒5:36)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Thêu-đa « quà tặng của Đức Chúa Trời »
